description: This file defines minimal data models (Event, Birthday, Message, UserProfile) used across a Flutter app, with serialization and deserialization helpers.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: Represents an event with id, title, and dateTime, with JSON conversion methods.

classes.name: Birthday
classes.description: Represents a birthday with id, name, and date, with JSON conversion methods.

classes.name: Message
classes.description: Represents a message with id, senderId, text, and sentAt timestamp, with JSON conversion methods.

classes.name: UserProfile
classes.description: Represents a user profile with uid, displayName, and email, with JSON conversion methods.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Serializes a class instance to a JSON map.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Deserializes a JSON map into a class instance.
